choices: This is terrible! (Disagrees with the situation)
They're so lucky! (Wants to join them)
Well, I'm burnt from soccer! (Wants worship)
We should tell the rest of the gang! (More giants)
1.content:
"WOW DAD! NO WAY! THIS IS TOO COOL! IS THIS ACTUALLY FOR REAL?!" Anthony belted in in pure excitement. Today was his 13th birthday and for this milestone event, his father decided to unveil the latest renovations to his sons playroom.

"Sure is son, in the middle of this playroom is a city currently inhabited by over one million people. The population consists mainly of the lower class and common criminals, so you needn't be too careful. Our ties with government organizations and the small size of this city shouldn't make it too hard to replace in case of any damage, so you shouldn't feel too bad if things get a little hectic. So, what do you think? Do you like it?" Mark asked, already knowing the answer from the glow of happiness on his sons face. Without much free time to devote to his only child, Mark was hoping he finally found a way to keep his son entertained while he was at work. When the government was looking for a way to reduce unemployment and crime rates, Mark knew he found his solution. Proposing his recently banned ShrinkSnap, Mark convinced the government that his low-cost technology was the best way to manage the countries undesirable population. Five years later, his son was gifted the greatest gif any thirteen year old boy could ever ask for...

"OH DO I! I can't wait to have Cody over! He isn't even gonna believe me when I tell him!" Anthony exclaimed, still unable to hold back his enthusiasm.

"Well, you can always have him over tonight when we cut your birthday cake, but for now, you should probably start getting ready for your soccer practice, the driver is gonna be bringing you in 15 minutes." Mark told his son.

"I wish you would bring me sometime dad, I know you're busy and all but I can't even remember the last time you came to a soccer event!" Anthony knew that his dad had to work extra hard to ensure the success of his company, and although this success made Anthony wealthier than almost all his friends, he also wished he would be able to spend more time with his father.

"I know sport, I promise, once I finish with this government contract, I'll come to every other game of this season! Promise!" Mark promised his young son even though he knew it was a promise he would surely break. The sad truth is Mark was a business man, and as much as he loved his son, his business came first.

"One last thing, I am gonna leave you the only civillian model of the ShrinkSnap ever made. This is NOT a toy! You coyld use it if ever you want to make the city bigger or smaller but remember the serious harm that could come about if you use it in the wrong way! At the right size, anything will pop like a bug! Now go get ready for practice!"

With that, Anthony went off to his soccer practice with the driver. After practice, his friend Cody came over for a sleep over. Mark implored that Anthony not tell Cody about the playroom until after the birthday cake, as he was on a limited time schedule and had to be back at work within the hour. After the cake, and a thoughtful little gift from Cody, Anthony was barely able to contain his excitement anymore. He asked Cody if he wanted to see his new gameroom, to which he immediately agreed.

As the doors the the newly constructed play area opened, Cody couldn't help but notice the gigantic lego city in the middle of the room. He curiously approached the Lego city before he came to a strange realization. The more he examined the city, the more clear it became that this was not made from Legos. Before he could even say anything he noticed a tiny movement on the top of one of the taller buildings. Upon further examination, he made out was clearly a tiny human, barely more than half an inch tall!

In a state of complete disbelief, Cody turns to his friend and says...
1.title: The gift

choices: Is ready to join Cody in the action
Just wanted to watch as Cody goes on his rampage
Wanted to shrink down to watch the carnage from Cody's body
Wanted to run from his giant friend in the city
11.content:
"This is awesome! We are literally like gods to these people!" Cody shouted out, clearly fascinated by the sight before his eyes. "You're so lucky! I wish my parents would get me something this awesome!" Anthony looked down at the floor in contempt. Although he was fairly certain that no one else in the world had this "playset" it still didn't substitute having his father around to actually spend time with him.

"Yeah, well it is pretty cool. What do you wanna do now?" Anthony replied, trying to hide his sadness from his friend.

Too excited to notice his friends bummed out mood, Cody asks "Can we pretend to be giants and stomp through the city? I've always liked Godzilla and it would be so cool to destroy our own tiny city!"

"Sure, but don't you think we should get ready for bed first? We wouldn't wanna stain our soccer uniform in case things get a little out of control!" Anthony suggested, not wanting to explain to coach all the blood stains that would be on his kit after the massacre.

Agreeing to this, both boys went to get their pyjamas on. Both boys, being on the same team, had no qualms about changing together. They both went into Anthonys bedroom to get out of their soccer uniforms. As they took off their shoes, the effects of soccer practice clearly invaded the oxygen supply in the room. Both boys turned to each other with a sour face. "Man, practice was tough today!" Cody laughed as he proceeded to remove his socks.

Anthony did the same, but instead of just throwing the sock on the floor, he lifted it to his nose to get the full idea of his foot stench. The moment the smell entered his nose, he swore his could feel all his little nose hairs slowly decomposing. "Oh my god that is fucking gross!" Anthony recoiled in disgust. "Coach should take it a little easier on us!"

Both boys finished changing and went back to the playroom, clad only in pairs of pyjama shorts.

"Alright, well, you ready to make our entrance?" Anthony asked his friend, eager to try out his new toy.

"Ready as ever!" Cody replied, before opening the grand door to the newly renovated play room.

As the boys entered the room, they wasted no time getting to the main attraction. Making sure to put extra emphasis on their footfalls, the giant preteens arrived to the edge of the city and stared down with a mischievous grin. Cody "kicked off" the fun when he looked down at his feet and noticed a tiny car trying to dodge the massive appendages. Without any second thought, Cody swings foward his leg rather rapidly towards the shrunken car...

*DRIVER POV*

You on your way to your new job when off in the distance, you could see two young teen boys making their way over to the city. You came to this city about 3 years ago, after losing your job and having your house repossessed. Not putting much thought into your future at such a tiny size, you quickly hoped on board with idea. The thought of never having to struggle financially, and providing a great life for your family, was more than enough for you to pack up your family and move over to the shrunken metropolis. Looking over in the horizon now though, you should have known that this city had a more sinister intent. Pulling your handbrake and turning your real as fast as you can, trying the flee the scene before the giant boys spotted you. Amidst all the panic however, you only manage to catch the boys attention even more. Looking in the rear view mirror, you can only watch in fear as a plump foot the size of a city block itself slowly creeps up from behind you. In a last minute attempt to save yourself, you decide to jump from the car, despite the current 100 mph you are currently traveling at. Opening the door, you decide it's now or never and make the jump. Eyes closed, you eject yourself from the car and hear the sound of metal compacting behind you. Surprisingly, you aren't injured at all. In fact, you don't even remember falling! Opening your eyes to deduce how you even survived such an event, you fall to the floor in horror when you find yourself standing on a huge, flesh colored plateau. You must have landed on the boys foot! Looking down, you see that the fall from here would be enough to break your legs for sure. You tried to look for an escape, but at this height, you were fairly sure you were stuck here. And then the smell hit you. At your size, the odor from one boys foot was akin to the entire locker room changing at once! The unnatural odor slowly made its way through your nostrils, slowly invading all your senses. Knowing that there was nothing you could do in your current situation, you just layed in defeat, cursing yourself for every agreeing to this weird experiment. You may have been the first victim today, but you knew you wouldn't be the last. With no other solution you call the police in a panic, hoping they may be able to get this under control...

*Boys POV*

Cody's foot made quick work of the tiny car. With one swift kick, he sent the car flying across the city before it impacted into a small building of about three floors on the opposite end of town. The impact of the car, while not enough to tear down the building completely, certainly was enough to create a decent sized hole in the infrastructure.

Cody couldn't believe the sheer amount of power he had over this doomed city. Only determined to do more damage, he finally steps over the border of the city and places his first foot in the city limits. Placing his foot down with a satisfied crunch, he notices his foot landing on a tiny Chevrolet dealership. Placing his other foot in the lot, he made short work of the dealership, making sure to crush every last car on the lot. The metal was no match for his young soles, as every car quickly quickly compressed under the weigh of the gargantuan boy. "Might wanna recheck the roof safety value on those cars!" Cody laughed, eager to try leveling more satisfying targets. Too bad it was night time, Cody was eager to stomp out any car salesmen too! Done with the car dealer, he slowly made his way further into the city...

Anthony could only watch in awe as his friend revealed a side he hadn't previously known. Although his friend did always enjoy snuffing bugs out under his feet, Anthony never thought he would be capable of doing this to actual people. Seeing his friend dominating the miniscule city down below made him feel a strange tugging in his shorts that he never felt before. Looking over at Cody's glistening body, making short work of the vehicles at his feet, Anthony decided he...
11.title: This is awesome! (Wants to play)

choices: Let's have a wrestling match, and level the city that way!
Lets continue our rampage, and destroy the city that way!
Let's go to sleep here, and see what kind of damage we do overnight!
111.content:
Wanted in on this action! "Wait for me!" Anthony called out to his friend as he jumped onto the city streets, the ball of his soft foot landing on a city bus on his way in. Anthony jumped up in pain, the feeling akin to stepping on a Lego. The sudden, unexpected movement caused Anthony to lose his balance and fall onto a building down below. "Ow! Fuck!" Anthony screamed as his bubble butt landed on the 6-story apartment complex down below.

By this moment, the city down below was in pandemonium. Everyone walking down Main street could only watch in horror as a giant young boy, no older than 13, approached from the horizon. People were flooding the streets in swarms, evacuating buildings, and warning loved ones by telephone about the incoming danger. Though the tiny inhabitants were used to seeing giant scientist and the like, they knew these boys for here for much darker reasons. As the boy approached the area where the hardwood floors met the the concrete city streets, his presence became much more disheartening to the people down below. The ground began to shake, as if the area was just about to be devastated by an earthquake of a large scale. Coffee mugs and microwaves began flying off peoples counters and soon, even people who were fast asleep were checking their windows to see what the cause of all this commotion was. The moment people saw the massive bare feet approaching the city, they immediately evacuated their families and ran for their cars. Onlookers on the street watched as the giant took his first step into the city. Unfortunately, a bus filled with people happened to be right in the trajectory of his foot fall. People were mortified as they watched the giant foot descend on the defenseless city bus. Though it all happened in an instant, it seemed like an eternity passed before the pudgy boy foot completely wiped the bus out of existence. The scarier part was yet to come however, as the boy yelped in pain, and proceeded to fall backwards, onto a residential apartment building. The building stood no match for the giant, toned butt, quickly succumbing to the equivalent of a fuck ton of pounds in their now incredibly minute scale. The people who didn't evacuate the building in time had no prior warning before the enormous, short clad bubble butt eliminated them from the gene pool. It was clear to the people down below that these two boys were quite active, as they were very lean and barely had an ounce of fat on their smooth bodies. They also left a strong aroma in the city air, with the air quickly clouding with the smell of pre-pubescent pheromones and summer sports. Most people were long gone but a few people stuck around to see what sort of damage this young colossus caused. As the boy was out on his ass, he brought his normal sized bare sole to his face, looking to see what he stepped on that hurt so bad.

"Crap! I stepped on a bus!" Anthony yelled out to his friend, peeling the scrap of metal off his delicate sole. He could make out a faint squelching noise as he broke the adhesion his sweat and the blood of innocents made to his grimy foot.

"Haha, you're such a pussy! I stepped on a whole parking lot just before!" Cody teased his friend, just as he spotted his own tiny bus making its way away from the two boys raw feet. Without second thought, he brought his massive sole down on the bus just to emphasize how much of a pussy his friend was. To his surprise, however, the boxy shape of the bus did prove to be a more damaging opponent than the standard automobile. He too yelped in pain, although always having cat-like reflexes, he managed to keep his balance. "Alright, that did hurt, but you still suck!" Cody continued, not letting his friend have the satisfaction on winning.

Anthony got up from the pile of debris and promptly dusted himself off. Despite the fact that his friend was three streets down, it took Anthony about 10 strides to catch up. Not wanting to deal with that pain again, he made sure to avoid any cars down on the road. Once Anthony caught up to his friend, they started their trek towards the large park at the center of the city. Despite Anthony's' caution to the city down below, people still found themselves in danger in the form of Cody. His giant, foul smelling feet made sure to crush absolutely everything in their path. From cars, to people, and especially cyclists, as they slid very nicely between his plump toes, no one was safe from the rampage fixated young boy. When they finally got to the park, they sat down in grass and decided on what to do next. That is when they decided...
111.title: Is ready to join Cody in the action

choices: At the middle of the city
1111.content:
They’ve been on a fantastic rampage since began playing with the miniature city. It was so fun in fact that both boys needed some rest at this point and sat on the park, unknowing that these little people was still playing until they took some amount of space majority. It was good to take a breather and have some fresh air it seems realistic when feeling it this way. It would take some time before Anthony had to figure things out and found a solution.

“Say Cody, do you think it should fun if we could have a wrestling match right now?” Anthony had some thoughts about this idea.

“So like Godzilla vs King Kong type of thing?” Cody wondered before he receive a nod from his best friend, and that’s when he smiled and nodded in reply. “Alright, I like the sound of that! I’m sure I’m gonna beat you down so easily.”

“Oh, tough talk eh?” That made Anthony smirked and stood up like he is firing it up. “Well let’s see about that then!”

So with that, Cody followed suit and stood up to get themselves ready for a wrestling match between two gigantic monster in the miniature city. But to make the scene, they need to know where they could have a tussle just o let these little notice everywhere, and the live media coverage can give some attention.

Both had some thought and decide to make their version of Godzilla vs King Kong, they set the scene by fighting it out at where?
1111.title: Their version from Godzilla vs King Kong

choices: Shrink Anthony as soon as he walks through the door
Shrinks himself before Anthony walks through the door
Just decides to proceed with the plan as normal
1113.content:
"Well, I'm pretty burnt!" Cody said, stretching his arms up while letting out a deep yawn.

"Yeah, I agree. Wanna go to bed? This place will still be here tomorrow." Anthony sleepily agreed with his friend.

"Yeah, sure thing." The boys got up from the small patch of grass that barely contained their massive bodies, when Anthony hatched up a brilliant idea.

"Hey Cody, what if we brought our sleeping bags out to this park and crashed here for the night?" Anthony suggested to his friend, curious as to what would happen overnight.

"That would be cool, if we weren't almost twice as big as their puny park!" Cody replied, looking down at his massive bare feet, trying to draw an exact comparison.

"Well, lucky for us, my dad left me a ShrinkSnap that we could use to make ourselves small enough to fit in the park! We'll still tower over everyone, but at least we won't have to worry about waking up every time we roll over a building!" Anthony exclaimed before grabbing his friend by the wrist and guiding him out of the city.

The tiny residents watched defenslessly as the two giant boys whoses faces have been lighting up local news for the past hour began their overhead. People ran in fear as the temperatures began to rise with the heat emanating from the ripe, pungent boy feet.
Despite their best efforts, the people down below were helpless as the mighty sole claimed many, washing their existences away with a river of salty foot sweat. The most unlucky, however, were those who were caught between the massive walls of flesh that were the gaps between the boys toes. They were instantly buried alive in the mounds of toe-jam between their active toes, with just enough air to keep them from dying and just enough pressure to keep them from moving. The odor was intolerable here, but the residents were forced to endure it until their newfound gods finally decided to have a shower.

Largely unconcerned with the wet pops beneath his slimy soles, Cody followed his friend until they stood on the edge of the cityscape.

"Alright, just wait right here. I'm just gonna go grab the sleeping bags. I'll be right back." Anthony told his friend before running out of the room to complete his task.

Cody has a look around the playroom while his friend is off getting their sleeping bag. He knew Anthony for most of his life and Anthony's house has sorta always been the designated chill space. Being richer than all the other already pretty wealthy kids, Anthony always had the coolest toys and the newest Lego sets. All these years later, who would have thought that he would even have a full city to play with as well. While, looking through all the other goodies, Cody notices a device that looks like a camera sitting on the computer desk. Curious, he walks over and picks it up. Upon further examination, he could make out the ShrinkSnap logo.

"No way! He actually has one! Oh man! This is so cool!" Before Cody could really examine it, he hears his friends voice call out "Alright, I brought the sleeping bags and my tablet so we could watch a movie. I also brough some snacks......"

Cody drowned out his friends voice as he was only able to think of the power he currently held in his hand. With this device, he was pretty much a god of size. He could make any living thing as big or as small as he wanted! Having only a split second to react before Anthony returns, Cody decides to use this new-found power to...
1113.title: Let's go to sleep here, and see what kind o...

choices: Cody played with Anthony with his feet
Cody picks up Anthony and places him on his shoulder
Cody decides to continue with the original plan
11131.content:
Cody decides to use this new-found power to shrink Anthony as soon as he walks through the door. Cody made some adjustments to the device and pressed a button to activate it. He aimed it at Anthony and when he saw what Cody was doing, he asked, "What are you do..." Anthony suddenly saw a flash of light and was blinded. It almost felt as if he was sinking. Soon enough, he could see his surroundings. The sleeping bags Anthony had brought in were now on top of him. He realized this, and couldn't believe that Cody had shrunken him like this!

Anthony managed to find his way out from the sleeping bag and got a look at his surroundings. He couldn't believe how big the room was! He looked back at the micro city. He wasn't as small as the citizens, but he wasn't that much bigger either. He had to be around 2 inches tall. That's when he heard Cody's footsteps, which sounded more like booms to him. Anthony turned around and saw his gigantic friend smiling down at him.

Cody was amazed at how well the device had worked. He had shrunk his friend down to 2 inches tall! He laughed and asked Anthony, "How's it going down there shrimp?" Anthony yelled up to Cody, "What the hell Cody! We were supposed to shrink down together, and not this small!" Cody responded, "I changed my mind, I like this much better than the idea before."

What did Cody do with Anthony?
11131.title: Shrink Anthony as soon as he walks through the ...

choices: Obey and clean up the mess, you value life
Disobey, Cody won't really kill you! Doesn't mean he'll make life easy!
111311.content:
Cowering at a pathetic 2 inches tall in the doorway of the room, Anthony was frozen in place as his behemoth of a friend approached him. The floor below shook as the stinky-footed giant made his way over. When the massive feet were close enough for the terrified bug boy to taste their odor, the much larger boy smiled down at his tiny friend and dictates his will.

"You know, as cool as it is, having a tiny city under your control... it feels a little impersonal" Cody says, as his giant toes slowly creep over the bug below him. "I don't know any of these people down below, it's easy to bend them. Turning you into my own little slave however, that'll be fun!"

Cody brings his foot down, sure to trap his between his big and second toe. As Anthony is battling the mountains of toe cheese and the distinct odor of boy feet, he is in complete disbelief that his own best friend can put him through this! "CODY YOU ASSHOLE! TURN ME BACK! THIS IS MY HOUSE AND MY TOY! YOU HAVE NO RIGHT YOU----" before he could finish, Cody clenched his toes, squeezing all the lint and dead skin accumulated from the earlier soccer match right into his unprepared mouth. As Anthony chokes on the vile creation, Cody laughs hysterically up above at the misfortune caused by a slight twitch of his toes.

"Aww man, kinda seems like I have every right, when me simply clenching my toes has that much power over you!" Cody taunted his tiny friend, still grinding him into the sludgy concoction between his toes.

"Besides, it's no secret that you kinda want this too. I saw you checking me out earlier. Mitch always thought you were a fag, but you confirmed it just before." Cody said down with a cocky smirk. Anthony blushed intensely, though this was probably missed my his friend on account of him being the size of a skyscraper in comparison.

Despite Anthony very much in fear of his life, he couldn't help but admit that this situation was more than a little exhilarating for him. He had always found his friends cocky attitude very appealing, and now with the size to back it up, Anthony found himself stiffening up a little. Among the cloudiness of lust and foot odor however, Anthony was still pissed that his friend betrayed him and continued his rant as soon as he could get the nasty gunk coating his mouth out.

Cody, fed up with his slaves insubordination, lets his slave fall from his musky prison onto the hardwood down below, before bringing his big toe over his tiny form to hold him down in place. "Listen up you little shit! The more you bitch and complain! The rougher I'm gonna make this! If you just do as I say, I'll have you back to normal by soccer practice tomorrow. If you keep being a disobedient fuck, you'll be coming as a stain under my superior sole, got that, bug?" Not even caring for an answer, Cody just continues laying down his law.

"Now for starters, I don't want my little slave to be so weak and scrawny! If you're gonna be of any use, you'll need some wholesome nutrition!" Cody says with a ginormous smirk on his pretty face. "Thankfully, there is plenty to be had between my toes! You should get to work on clearing all that up! Don't want to go to bed with stinky feet!"

Despite the horrendous smell and revolting sights awaiting between his enormous toes, Anthony knows in his position, he is completely at his larger friends mercy. Knowing his treason could very well spell death, he decides to...
111311.title: Cody played with Anthony with his feet

choices: He took out the ShrinkSnap, shrinks Anthony more
1113111.content:
Knowing his treason could very well spell death, he decides to obey his giant friend. Anthony values his life, and he especially didn't want to be killed by getting stepped on by his friend's huge feet.

Anthony climbed up Cody's foot until he reached his toes. He glanced up at Cody's face and Cody was staring down at him, smiling. Cody knew what Anthony didn't want to get killed, so Anthony was going to do whatever he told him to do.

Anthony stared down at the area between Cody's toes and wanted to vomit. The smell was terrible along with the disgusting toe jam and dead skin that lay in the crevices. Cody started to laugh when he saw Anthony struggling to even breath and said, "You better get to work quickly slave, or else I'll have to punish you!" As soon as Anthony heard this, he got to work. He got on his hands and knees and started to lick the toe jam and dead skin off of Cody's toes. He wanted to throw up so bad, but he knew Cody would punish him if he did.

Anthony continued to collect the dead skin and toe jam in between Cody's big and second toe and actually finished cleaning the are pretty quickly, but there was plenty of work left. Cody said, "Wow slave! You finished that area quicker than I expected! I guess you deserve a prize!" Anthony actually got a little excited when he heard this, thinking he would actually get a reward. However, Cody had no intention of giving his foot slave an actual award.

What did Cody do?
1113111.title: Obey and clean up the mess, you value life

choices: Place Anthony in the city and start another rampage
11131111.content:
Cody pulled the ShrinkSnap out from behind him and aimed it at Anthony. He pressed the button and Anthony started to shrink once again! Anthony saw as Cody's feet began to grow bigger and bigger. He couldn't believe how small Cody was making him! The shrinking stopped when he was about 1/2 and inch tall, the same size as the citizens. It doesn't seem like Anthony lost a lot of height, but to him it looked like Cody had almost doubled in size! Cody's big and second toes now toward over Anthony.

Anthony was furious when the shrinking was over, he was supposed to be a giant compared to the citizens, not among them! He yelled up to Cody, "You giant jerk! You said I was getting a prize!" Cody started the laugh hysterically. Once he stopped laughing he said, "You actually thought I was going to give you a prize? How pathetic! Your prize is that I don't kill you right now for slacking off! Now get back to work before I shrink you even smaller!" That last sentence scared Anthony enough to go back to what he was doing before. He didn't want to get smaller, then he would be smaller than the inhabitants of the city!

The job was now much tougher for Anthony. Everything was so much bigger than before. It wasn't as simple to clear out all of the gunk in between Cody's toes. Meanwhile, Cody was getting a kick out of this. He couldn't believe how small is friend was now. He was crawling around in between his toes eating all of the gunk in there! He wanted to laugh so hard at the thought.

Anthony continued on his quest to clear all of Cody's toe gunk. He hated it more after each passing second. Just then Cody decided to humiliate his friend even further.

What did he do?
11131111.title: He took out the ShrinkSnap, shrinks Anthony more

choices: Placed him in the city, started another rampage
111311111.content:
Cody saw that Anthony was kneeling in between his second and third toes. He was doing as Cody told him, cleaning up the gunk in between his toes, but there had to be another level of humiliation.

Cody squeezed his toes together as hard as he could and felt Anthony squirm in between them. When this happened, Anthony didn't know what to do. He was being crushed in between his friends gigantic toes. He couldn't breathe! Soon enough, Cody's grip on him loosened and Anthony dropped back onto the fleshy surface of Cody's foot.

Anthony couldn't take it anymore, he was sick of his friend being so big compared to him! It was too easy for Cody to humiliate him. He yelled up to Cody, "That's enough Cody! It's time for you to make me my normal size again! I'm done playing your stupid game! You could have killed me just now, I couldn't breathe!" When Cody heard this, a mischievous smile had appeared on his face. He had just gotten an idea that he would love and Anthony would despise, he may not want to be friends with him after it, but it was worth it. Cody looked down at Anthony and said, "Are you saying you need more room? Because I can help you with that!"

What did Cody do to Anthony?
111311111.title: Squeezed his toes together

1113111112.content:
Cody plucked Anthony off of his foot and placed him on a random road in the city. Anthony looked up at Cody and yelled, "Thanks for at least taking me off of your foot, can you grow me back now?" Cody responded, "I could, but that's not really what I had in mind." At the end of his sentence, Cody raised his foot over the tiny Anthony. Anthony knew what Cody was going to do, he was going to start another rampage! He needed to run! Anthony took off as fast as he could as Cody brought his foot down on the spot where Anthony once stood. Cody lifted his foot up and there was a huge imprint left of it in the street. Cody laughed and said, "You can run, but you can't hide little Anthony!"

Cody continued to cause incredible amounts of destruction to the city as Anthony continued to try and outrun his gigantic friend. Anthony managed to reach the center of the city, where everybody was in a panic. Cody soon arrived and knelt down to see if he could find his small friend. He said, "Anthony, where are you? Don't you want to spend more time with your best bud? Especially with my feet?" That's when he got up and brought his foot down onto the center of the city. Luckily, Anthony had managed to escape and find a hiding spot in a near by building.

There was no way Anthony wanted to spend anymore time with Cody's feet right now. They were too gross! He had to find a way to get back to normal size though.

That happened next?
1113111112.title: Placed him in the city, started another rampage

11131111123.content:
Cody continued to search for Anthony throughout the city, destroying more buildings as he did it. Cody was getting frustrated that he couldn’t find his little friend. That frustration soon turned to anger and Cody wanted to punish Anthony and the rest of the city even further.

Cody left the city briefly and returned to where he had put the ShrinkSnap. Meanwhile, Anthony made his way to the roof of the building he was in so he could get a better look at what Cody was doing. He saw Cody went back to get the ShrinkSnap and Anthony knew what he was planning. He started to run out of the building so he could get out of the city before Cody shrunk it, it’s civilians, and himself even more!

Cody made some adjustments to the device and aimed it at the city, he said, “Alright Anthony, you and the rest of these little runts asked for this! I hope you enjoy being even smaller!” Cody activated the device and the beam struck the middle of the city. Just then, the city, it’s inhabitants, and Anthony watched as Cody began to look larger and larger. The city and the people in it began to shrink more and more as Cody watched, smiling.

How small did the city become?
11131111123.title: Shrinks Anthony and the city more

choices: Try and get to the ShrinkSnap
111311111232.content:
Cody really wanted to punish Anthony and the rest of the city. He wanted to show them how insignificant he thought they were. The city continued to shrink until it became extremely small. Anthony and the rest of the civilians were now no more than 1/16 of an inch tall. They looked up and saw Cody’s toes now towering above the rooftops. If they were scared before, they were much more terrified now.

Cody placed the ShrinkSnap down next to him and looked down at the tiny city, wondering what to do to show his power. He lifted his foot above the city to compare the size of it. He could now wipe out the entire city with one step. He didn’t want to do that though. He saw his big toe could now destroy multiple buildings at a time. Even his pinkie toe could do a lot of damage. Cody brought his big toe down into the center of the city and destroyed many building in that area by doing so. The citizens screamed and ran, but the couldn’t escape Cody’s gigantic toe. They were either crushed underneath it or crushed by the falling debris.

Anthony managed to escape that part of the city though. He saw what Cody did and couldn’t believe the size of his best friend. He just destroyed a big part of the city with one toe! Anthony couldn’t help but feel guilty for the current condition of the city and it’s inhabitants. He decided he needed to do something.

What did he decide to do?
111311111232.title: A lot smaller, 1/16 inch civilians

1113111112321.content:
Anthony knew that Cody was after him, and maybe if he got his attention then there was a better chance he wouldn’t be killed. Anthony even hoped that Cody would grow him a little.

Anthony took off running toward Cody and he really began to notice just how big Cody was. Cody’s toes looked like buildings themselves, while the rest of Cody towered over the city. He was like a living mountain.

Anthony soon reached Cody’s left foot, his right foot was the one doing all the damage. Anthony started to climb up Cody’s left big toe. He thought if he could get to the top of Cody’s toe, then maybe he’ll be able to see him.

Once Anthony reached the top of Cody’s toe, he started jumping up and down, waving at his gigantic friend, trying to get his attention.

Did Cody see Anthony?

He was currently standing on Cody’s left big toe. He was actually standing on the nail. Cody couldn’t see or hear Anthony, but maybe Anthony could get his attention by making Cody feel where he was.

Anthony climbed down Cody’s toe so he was standing underneath his toenail. He was going to try and get Cody’s attention be causing some pain on his toe. Anthony ventured underneath Cody’s big toe nail and pinched the skin.

Did Cody notice Anthony this time?

When Anthony saw Cody’s building sized face getting closer, he ventured out from underneath his friend’s toenail. He was so happy that his plan had worked!

When Anthony got out from underneath the toenail, he started jumping up and down, and waved at his gigantic friend. Cody squinted as he saw something very small on his toe moving. He said, “Is that you Anthony? If it is you move to my left.” Anthony pumped his fist, he’s happy that his friend saw him. So he listened to his mountainous friend and moved to Cody’s left.

When Cody saw the speck on his toe move to the left, he started laughing. He said, “Wow Anthony that is you! Your so small now I can’t even tell if your a person or a piece of lint!” Anthony frowned after Cody said this, but it was true. Anthony was basically as small, or even smaller, than a piece of lint on his friend’s big toe.

As he runs his feet leave craters in the asphalt, his feet kicking cars into nearby buildings, and indiscriminately destroying all near him. Catching up to the group he lifts his foot overhead. Cody slowly lowers his foot down, as he increases the weight he can feel their struggles against his sticky soles. To the littles it was hell, the smell of post-practice feet assaulted them. Many gagging and passing out from the horrid stench alone. As Cody increased the pressure, they began to pop under his foot. Cody felt amazing, lifting his foot back up he admired his work. A few are completely incapacitated from the terrible odor, prone in the street fighting against the miasma flowing through their streets.

He glanced over at Anthony, who was still relaxing at the edge of the tiny city, his long legs and feet having caused plenty of havoc on their own and gave him a little wink as he lifted his sweat stained arm up and gave it a sniff. "Oh man this is gonna be sooo bad for those little guys". Cody chuckled before Anthony laughed too, pointing to his friend's rancid pits. "Dude that's nasty, i mean that's cruel even for you".

Shrugging his broadening shoulders, Cody knelt down, towering over the city as he pulled off his shirt, revealing his smooth, flat teenage stomach, some tinies looked up in awe before he lifted his arm, revealing the handful of hairs sprouting within his glistening sweaty pits.

The tiny people that were trying to help their fellow tinies out of the pit turned and ran as fast as they could as the giant teenager licked his lips and leaned down, exposing his armpit to the city before moaning a little as he knocked over some buildings with his extended elbow and placed his armpit over the hole.

Anthony can know this feeling and it even come to a point when he looked around and feels like a citizen of the city itself. This made feel blessed when he can see so many people and the traffic looking so busy so well.

“Wow! I can’t believe I’m amongst those people in this city now.”

Anthony can say with that, but one thing he almost forgot is they also started to run away screaming, and it can only be one thing. Further down the distance, he had to ran over before spotted his now giant best friend, still taking a rampage from this angle. This is some chilling moment from Anthony and felt so shocked that he’s looking at Cody as a monstrous figure taking control of the mini city.

“Man, that is unbelievable!” He says with a stunned look to his face.

But now, he wanted to make Cody stunned to see him like this. So Anthony had to come up with a plan to make his friend notice, wether to be seen or hear by any means? He can try and his option is to try and...
113.title: Anthony wants to experience being in a tiny city.

choices: ...be amongst the people in the middle of the city.
13.content:
“No freaking way! I never knew these are real humans in this tiny little city.” Cody was astonishingly shocked to learn what he saw when seeing up close to the buildings and all.

“Yep! Everything you see here are all real, and can be replaced if any damage happens, so it’s a fun thing to look at.” Anthony replied, whilst he was delighted to hear his best friend’s reaction of this new playroom, he couldn’t wait to experience something his Dad made just for him to play with.

“I tell ya, these puny people are so lucky. I wish wanna be just like them and explore being little for a while.” That’s when Cody had this great thought and could imagine himself being amongst those people in this miniaturised city.

As far as Anthony was concerned, he was deeply surprised to hear what Cody had wished for. But luckily, his Dad left the ShrinkSnap for him to try things too, and responded to his best friend with a giggle.

“That can be arranged, since I got this device just about here.” Anthony says and shows the remote device right in front of him. “We should get changed to our pajamas first before we can do make this happen.

“Wait, I think I’ll be okay being like this.” Cody responded when he decides to make an idea. “How about we can play hide and seek. When you go out and get changed, I’ll shrink myself down to size and hide somewhere around this city, so you can find me from there.” That would be his idea, which Anthony seems to be impressed by this particular idea.

“Okay, let’s try that then! So get ready while I’ll be right back, mini you!” Anthony joked and walked out of the room and closed the door from behind.

As for Cody though, he couldn’t wait to get started and takes a look at the device in hand. He wouldn’t believe at this point things can be real, but whatever happened to this city or more would surely be a true reality and takes deep breaths before triggered the device on himself. It wouldn’t take long to feel the effects, and it so happens when Cody had started to shrink down and was now the size like the rest of these people in miniature city in all.

“Whoa! This looks so cool! A youngster couldn’t believe it in shock and walked through the streets to see the busy looking city flowing through. Everything seems real! Even the people looked real when being spoken to in greeting. “Man, I’m sure Anthony had the best birthday he can ever have. Speaking of that, I better hide and wait for my friend to come and find me.”

Cody nearly forgot about that, and so he had to take a run and explore to see where’s the best place to be hidden, so that he wanted to make this a surprise. He wouldn’t have time to come up much longer since Anthony could come in any minute from now. So he made his mind up and...
13.title: Cody wants to be miniature sized

choices: Why don’t you get a foot rub too?
14.content:
Cody turned to Anthony and said, “I’m exhausted from Soccer. My feet are especially sore. I think these little guys should rub my feet!” Anthony responded, “Hold on Cody, I don’t want you to damage any part of the city. My Dad would kill me if any part of it was damaged.” Cody said, “Will you calm down? I’ll be careful! Besides, when else are you going to encounter tiny people who can rub your feet?”

Cody sat down in front of the small city and said, “Alright little people, unless you want to get crushed under these magnificent feet, you better start rubbing them!” The tiny civilians in the city became terrified of the giant that sat before them. They didn’t want their city or they themselves go get crushed. They ran toward the building sized feet and began preforming the foot rub the giant requested. They climbed all over Cody’s foot to make sure they didn’t miss a spot.

Cody was very pleased with his foot rub. He looked over to Anthony and asked...
14.title: Well, I'm burnt from soccer! (Wants worship)

choices: Anthony allows Cody to shrink him
144.content:
Cody was enjoying himself. Getting his feet rubbed by 1/2 inch tall people was really cool for him, but what he didn't know is that he had Anthony had a certain interest as well. Anthony was so excited about the ShrinkSnap and the tiny city because he'd always had a little obsession with size. Not being a big guy at 5'4", Anthony was a little in awe of Cody. Cody was big for 13, standing at 6'4" with size 15 feet. Anthony knew that Cody was going to end up being really big, and that excited him. Seeing him get his feet rubbed by the tiny people only excited him more though.

Cody looked over at his friend and saw him staring at him and asked, "You look like you're in a trance Anthony? What's up?" Anthony sighed and confessed his interest in size and how he liked how big Cody was. Cody smiled and said, "That's actually kind of cool! I like being big!" Anthony smiled, "Your already 6'4 and have huge feet, and you're only 13! I think that's so cool!" Cody laughed and said, "I'm still gonna grow a lot more too!" Anthony and Cody shared a laugh and Cody then asked Anthony, "Do you want to rub my feet a little bit?" Anthony looked at his friend and nodded.

Cody brushed all of the 1/2 inch people off of his feet and moved his large feet toward Anthony. Cody said, "Alright, here you go size lover!" Anthony, with Cody's feet in his lap, began rubbing. He actually really enjoyed doing this for Cody. Cody's feet were kind of gross after soccer practice, all sweaty and stinky, but Anthony liked it.

What happened next?
144.title: Do you want to rub my feet too?

choices: Anthony goes to the city to raise hell
Anthony changes his mind and wants to grow back
1442.content:
Anthony rubbed Cody's feet for a while enjoying the feeling between his hands, as he does this Cody looks around the room and notices a camera in the corner just sitting on a tripod facing the wall. Cody asks "What's with the camera?"
"Oh... Umm, I don't know if I should tell you or not."
"What?! Well now you have to tell me! I promise it'll be our little secret, little buddy." Cody said knowing Anthony enjoyed the size difference between the two boys.
"Okay I'll tell you. That. Is the shrink ray. It's the reason these people exists, I guess my dad forgot to take it out of here, I should probably put it back." Anthony said starting to stand and walk towards the device. Cody quickly got up and stood between his friend and the camera.
" Hey I just got a great idea! You like being the fact that I'm big right?" Anthony slowly nodded, curious about Cody's intentions.
"Well what if before you put the shrink ray back we use it to make you smaller and then you can play in the city a little and rub my feet like those tiny people?!" Cody knew that if it were anyone other then Anthony it would be an immediate "no" but he knew that Anthony enjoyed that idea. There was silence for a minute as Anthony thought about. Cody quickly piped up and said.
"Your dad won't even know." this swayed Anthony.
"Okay but not for long and NOT too small."
"YES! Okay deal! So how do I work this thing?" Cody was by the machine looking at the on button. Anthony walked over and said.
"YOU don't, I will in case somthing goes wrong." he walkedv over to the machine, pushed a couple of buttons flipped a few switches then stopped and pondered.
"How small?"
"Ummmm..." Cody walked over to the mini-city and grabbed a person and guessed they are about 1/2 tall.
"do like a foot?"
"Sure sounds good."
Anthony entered "12" into the device's key pad, a red light glowed from the lens as Anthony turned the camera to the empty space in the room.
"Okay when I say so he that green button on top." Anthony said as he walked in front of the Ray.
"Okay!" Cody said practically running to the device. Anthony readied himself and nodded at Cody. Cody hit the button and a red beam fired from the lens hitting Anthony in the chest and he slowly started shrinking. Cody couldn't be happier while Anthony was a little nervous. Once he hit the determined hight the beam stopped and reverted back to the lens. Anthony looked around in awe of his position.
"Whoa." the two boys said at the same time. Cody slowly walked over to his friend and got down on his hands and knees to look at him.
"Cooooool! So what first?"
1442.title: Anthony allows Cody to shrink him

info.brief_description: A 13 year old boy gets a new playroom with a living, miniaturized city as the centerpiece
info.description:
Thirteen year-old Anthony is your average North American kid. At 5 feet 4, he isn't all that tall, but he isn't too short. With his long blond hair and bright green eyes, he has that typical surfer boy charm found in most coastal California kids his age. The one thing that separated him from the rest of the population however, was his not so normal life at home.

Anthony's father, Mark, was the CEO of a big Silicon Valley tech firm, meaning that he rarely spent any time with his son. Due to the fact his wife passed during childbirth, Anthony spent most of his life under nanny supervision. This was okay at first, but as Anthony grew to be more mischevious, many nannies refuse to work for the family anymore. Despite all this, Anthony normally does pretty good at caring for himself.

Long searching for a way to keep Anthony distracted from the complications that arise from his own lack of time, Mark figured the perfect solution to his problem when he finished working on one of his products five years back. ShrinkSnap, a fully functioning shrink ray shaped like a common camera, was a way to shrink humans down to rather minute sizes in order to engage in escapades normally unthinkable to the common mind. In spite of the ad campaign demonstrating a product that was virtually harmless, with commercials featuring a giant boy watching his friends ski down an ice cream sundae, the ATF quickly considered the ShrinkSnap to be far too dangerous for public use and banned its civillian use. Despite this, the product was quickly adopted for use within government ranks and was used to manage the undesirable population. Among the ShrinkSnap's success, Mark started another company where he would take care of people who the ShrinkSnap were used on. The people would be held in a miniature city in the playroom of his multi-miliion dollar mansion. A city which was oddly erected on the day of his sons 13th birthday. This is where the story begins...

TLDR: 13 year old boy has a miniature city in his playroom complete with tiny people.

RULES: Not much of a conformist although there will be some basic rules.

Firstly, keep interactions all male. You don't have to make Anthony gay but there will certainly be no girls in this playroom.

Second, no one-liners. If I wanted to read one sentence at a time, I'd hit up my local elementary school. This is writing.com and hence people should actually write.

Third, I won't be hating on people who misspell or misuse words. Not everyone speaks English as a first language and I by no means seek to put down anyone's effort. The only thing I do ask however, is if you know English isn't your strongsuit, don't be afraid to use spellcheck, that is what it's there for!

Apart from that, add or don't add to your hearts content!
